Not an "endorsement", but rather my acknowledgement of a well handled 
sale...I gave positive feedback after receiving my purchase.  The 
service was fast and I liked what I received.

I try to judge both the item and the seller.  I would have no 
reservations placing another bid after my initial experience with 
mrvtjun.
